ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (RecordType.Name == 'Contractor' || RecordType.Name == 'Designer') && (ISPICKVAL(BUR__c, '') || ISPICKVAL(SBS__c, '') || ISPICKVAL(Single_Ply__c, '') || (VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT( BUR__c ), '%', '')) + VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT( SBS__c ), '%', '')) + VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT( Single_Ply__c ), '%', '')) != 100))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: BUR% + SBS% + Single Ply % must equal 100%
